item.title: CVE-2019-0218|2024-08-04T17:44:14.890Z -- the%20apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20pony%20mail%20%28incubating%29
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered wherein a specially crafted URL could enable reflected XSS via JavaScript in the pony mail interface.
